channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Business Hours Pro

item.title: CVE-2021-24240|2024-08-03T19:21:18.939Z -- unknown -- business%20hours%20pro
item.description: The Business Hours Pro WordPress plugin through 5.5.0 allows a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files using its manual update functionality, leading to an unauthenticated remote code execution vulnerability.
